trans-unit.source: Postorius needs a running version of GNU Mailman version 3.3.0
trans-unit.target: Postorius needs a running version of GNU Mailman version 3.3.0

trans-unit.source: The Postorius Django app provides a web user interface to access GNU Mailman.
trans-unit.target: The Postorius Django app provides a web user interface to access GNU Mailman.

trans-unit.source: To install GNU Mailman Suite follow the instructions in the documentation: https://docs.mailman3.org/
trans-unit.target: To install GNU Mailman Suite follow the instructions in the documentation: https://docs.mailman3.org/

trans-unit.source: You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with mailman.client. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
trans-unit.target: You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with mailman.client. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
